name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
role_name: Software Engineer specializing in Account Lifecycle and Access Management (IAM)
profile_summary:
As a proficient Software Engineer specializing in Account Lifecycle and Access Management (IAM), I bring 8 years of experience in full-stack development and a strong command of **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, as well as extensive expertise in **AWS**. My proficiency includes designing and implementing scalable solutions with **REST APIs**, **SQL**, and **NoSQL** databases, ensuring robust access control mechanisms using **OAuth**, **OpenID Connect**, **SAML 2.0**, **SCIM**, **LDAP**, and **Active Directory**.

I possess a solid background in cloud architecture utilizing **AWS CloudFormation** and **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, and orchestration tools such as **Kubernetes** to manage containerized applications. My hands-on experience in developing secure solutions aligns with compliance standards including RBAC, ABAC, and ReBAC, essential for IAM functionalities. I also leverage best practices in CI/CD automation to streamline deployment processes.

Combined with my strengths in microservices architecture and proficiency in frameworks like **React** and **Next.js**, I have successfully led teams to develop enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for advanced operational efficiencies.
